speaker: Susan
content: I wouldn't eat that if I were you.

speaker: Susan
content: I made it. Trust me. Hey, do you have a death wish?
mark: Do you have a death wish? 对当下明显的危险、鲁莽行为发出质问

speaker: Mike
content: No, I just refuse to believe that anybody can screw up macaroni and cheese.
mark: refuse to believe 不相信：拒绝相信某事或某人所说的话。
screw up 搞砸 screw 螺丝 screw it up

speaker: Mike
content: Oh my god. How did you...? It tastes like it's burnt and undercooked.
mark: burnt 烧坏的，烧伤的  burn 烧，燃烧，消耗
undercooked 煎（或烤、炸）得火候不足的；煮得欠熟的

speaker: Susan
content: Yeah, I get that a lot. Here you go.
mark: I get that a lot 我经常听到（别人这么说）；这种情况我碰到很多次了；我常常遇到这样的事
Here you go 给你；拿去吧；递给别人东西时说

speaker: Mike
content: Thanks, I'm Mike Delfino. I just started renting the Sims' house next door.

speaker: Susan
content: Susan Mayer. I live across the street.

speaker: Mike
content: Oh yeah, Mrs. Huber told me about you, said you illustrate children's books.
mark: illustrate 加插图于；说明，阐明；illustrate a story为一个故事配图

speaker: Susan
content: Yeah, I'm very big with the under-five set. What do you do?
mark: be big with...  “受…… 欢迎；在…… 群体中很吃得开”
the under-5 set. 五岁以下的群体== under the age of 5.
What do you do 你是做什么工作的

speaker: Mike
content: Plumber. So if you ever have a clog... or something.

speaker: Susan
content: Now that everybody's seen that I brought something. I should probably just throw this out.
